translation.en: [Norma] Don Quixote is one of my favorite novels.
translation.it: Don Chisciotte è uno dei miei libri preferiti.

translation.en: And, in it, Don Quixote is a madman.
translation.it: E Don Chisciotte è un pazzo.

translation.en: And everything that he sees, he sees in a different light.
translation.it: E tutto ciò che vede, lo vede sotto una luce diversa.

translation.en: Don Quixote sees these windmills, but in his mind, they're not, uh…
translation.it: Don Chisciotte vede i mulini a vento, ma per lui non sono mulini a vento.

translation.en: They're not windmills. They're giants.
translation.it: Don Chisciotte vede i mulini a vento, ma per lui non sono mulini a vento. Sono giganti.

translation.en: We know that we're not mad. We know that there is something credible to this
translation.it: Sappiamo che non siamo matti. Sappiamo che c'è qualcosa di credibile,

translation.en: because too many people saw these, uh, lights in the sky.
translation.it: perché in troppi hanno visto le luci nel cielo.

translation.en: And so, um… We're-We're not-- We're not a Don Quixote. There's-There's more to this.
translation.it: E quindi non siamo Don Chisciotte. C'è dell'altro.

translation.en: [Robert] You can argue, "Well, it was some secret US black project, right?"

translation.en: But our technologies don't just suddenly leap

translation.en: across 100 years of-of technology.
translation.it: di 100 anni in avanti di colpo.

translation.en: Th-They're gradually created.

translation.en: In this case, I think whatever people saw was intelligently controlled.
translation.it: In questo caso, credo che quello che hanno visto, fosse controllato in modo intelligente.

translation.en: And it was not manufactured by the United States or any other nation, for that matter.
translation.it: E non era un prodotto degli Stati Uniti o di nessun'altra nazione.

translation.en: So, about nine months later,
translation.it: Circa nove mesi dopo,

translation.en: I was driving my daughter to gymnastics in Dublin,
translation.it: accompagnavo mia figlia all'allenamento a Dublin

translation.en: and I saw… [scoffs] …some lights.
translation.it: e ho visto delle luci.

translation.en: I pulled over to the side of the road, and I just stopped and looked out my front window.
translation.it: Mi sono fermata e ho guardato fuori dalla macchina.

translation.en: And they kinda were blinking or kinda coming in and out of focus.
translation.it: Erano intermittenti, come se pulsassero.

translation.en: And then they kinda came together, cohesively, and-- and just sort of disappeared.
translation.it: E poi si sono unite, in modo coeso, e sono sparite.

translation.en: I just was so shaken and so shocked. I thought, "My gosh." "I'm seeing what everybody's been talking about all this time."
translation.it: Ero proprio sconvolta. Ho pensato: "Ho visto quello di cui parlano tutti".

translation.en: It felt like the universe was sort of playing a trick on me, like… [chuckles]
translation.it: Mi sembrava che l'universo mi facesse uno scherzo…

translation.en: I balked at this story so hard in the beginning and for so long.
translation.it: Ho osteggiato la storia fin dall'inizio e per molto tempo.

translation.en: And then, you know, months later, it was sort of like, you know, here it is.
translation.it: E poi, mesi dopo, le ho viste anch'io.

translation.en: I can't believe all of the wonderful people I've met.
translation.it: Ho conosciuto tantissime persone meravigliose.

translation.en: And that's the good of UFO reporting.
translation.it: E questo è il bello della cronaca sugli UFO.

translation.en: I've loved every minute of it,
translation.it: Ho adorato ogni secondo

translation.en: and I hope that I'm gonna be doing this for a long time. -Thank you. -[audience applauding]
translation.it: e spero di farlo ancora per molto tempo. Grazie.

translation.en: [Sara] If I could talk to Angelia again, I would tell her how brave she was
translation.it: Se potessi parlarle di nuovo, le direi quanto è stata coraggiosa

translation.en: for understanding that there was a story there to be told.
translation.it: ad aver capito che c'era una notizia da raccontare.

translation.en: And I certainly wish that, uh, we had parted ways differently if--

translation.en: [voice breaks] My-My biggest regret of all is that.
translation.it: Questo è il mio più grande rimpianto.

translation.en: [Steve] Our business suffered

translation.en: because I was chasing the unidentified object that we saw.
translation.it: perché inseguivo l'oggetto non identificato che abbiamo visto.

translation.en: So it put an undue strain on our relationship and her as well.

translation.en: And after 17 years of being together and married,
translation.it: E dopo 17 anni di matrimonio,

translation.en: we ended up getting a divorce.
translation.it: abbiamo divorziato.

translation.en: My relationship suffered. My company suffered. I suffered.
translation.it: La mia relazione ha sofferto. La mia azienda ha sofferto. Ho sofferto.

translation.en: I still consider it a blessing that I did see it, and it's forever in my mind.
translation.it: Ma mi considero fortunato di averlo visto. Rimarrà scolpito nei miei pensieri.

translation.en: I'm still on my quest, still to this day.
translation.it: È ancora la mia missione, anche adesso.

translation.en: I will find out what happened.
translation.it: Scoprirò cos'è successo.

translation.en: This is a great big open secret.

translation.en: Nothing I am saying is anything new.

translation.en: It's just a matter of, are you gonna believe it or not?
translation.it: È solo questione di crederci o no.
